009package imagingbook.pdf;
010
011import java.io.IOException;
012
013import com.lowagie.text.DocumentException;
014import com.lowagie.text.pdf.BaseFont;
015
016import imagingbook.core.resource.NamedResource;
017
018
019/**
020 * This class collects the set of 14 Type-1 standard fonts that every
021 * PS/PDF reader is supposed to have available by default.
022 * The associated resource directory contains both .AFM and .PFB files.
023 * iText/OpenPDF never embeds any of these fonts on the exported PDF,
024 * which may cause problems during pre-press checking, where generally
025 * ALL fonts should be embedded.
026 * 
027 * @author WB
028 *
029 */
030public enum Type1CoreFont implements NamedResource {
031        Courier("Courier.afm"),
032        CourierBold("Courier-Bold.afm"),
033        CourierBoldOblique("Courier-BoldOblique.afm"),
034        CourierOblique("Courier-Oblique.afm"),  
035        Helvetica("Helvetica.afm"),
036        HelveticaBold("Helvetica-Bold.afm"),
037        HelveticaBoldOblique("Helvetica-BoldOblique.afm"),
038        HelveticaOblique("Helvetica-Oblique.afm"),      
039        TimesRoman("Times-Roman.afm"),
040        TimesBold("Times-Bold.afm"),
041        TimesBoldItalic("Times-BoldItalic.afm"),
042        TimesItalic("Times-Italic.afm"),        
043        Symbol("Symbol.afm"),
044        ZapfDingbats("ZapfDingbats.afm");
045        
046        private static final String BASEDIR = "fonts/type1";    
047        private final String filename;
048        private BaseFont basefont = null;               // cached singleton BaseFont instance
049
050        /**
051         * Constructor.
052         * @param filename the name of the font's AFM file
053         */
054        Type1CoreFont(String filename) {
055                this.filename = filename;
056        }
057        
058        @Override
059        public String getFileName() {
060                return filename;
061        }
062        
063        @Override
064        public String getRelativeDirectory() {
065                return BASEDIR;
066        }
067        
068        /** 
069         * Returns the {@link BaseFont} instance associated with this enum element.
070         * The font is created when this method is called the first time.
071         * 
072         * @return the {@link BaseFont} instance associated with this font
073         */
074        public BaseFont getBaseFont() {
075                if (basefont == null) {
076                        try {
077                                String fontpath = getURL().toString();
078                                basefont = BaseFont.createFont(fontpath, "", BaseFont.EMBEDDED);
079                        } catch (DocumentException | IOException e) { 
080                                System.out.println("Trouble: " + e);
081                        }
082                }
083                return basefont;
084        }
085
086        // -----------------------------------------------
087        
088        public static void main(String[] args) {
089                System.out.println("Font resource is in JAR: " + Type1CoreFont.Courier.isInsideJar());
090                for (Type1CoreFont sf : Type1CoreFont.values()) {
091                        System.out.println(sf.toString() + ": " + sf.getBaseFont().getPostscriptFontName());
092                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getRelativePath());
093                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getStream());
094                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getURL());
095                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getBaseFont());
096                        
097                }
098        }
099
100}
101
